title: Filmmakers escorted Rasoulof to the Revolutionary Court + film

sources.title: Filmmakers escorted Rasoulof to the Revolutionary Court + film
sources.description: Filmmakers escorted Rasulov to the Revolutionary Court + film Radio Farda - Iranian filmmaker Mohammad Rasulov went to the Revolutionary Court to appeal his sentence on Monday, with a group of filmmakers reportedly accompanying him. Bahman Farman Ara, Asghar Farhadi, Rakhshan Bani Etemad, Fatemeh Motamed Aria, Kianoush Eiar, Majid Barzegar, Jafar Panahi, Farhad Tohidi, Amir Posbati, Reza Darmishian, Hassan Pourshirazi, Keyvan Mojatibi, Mohammad Rasim, Jamal Rahim Were accompanied. The Revolutionary Court has sentenced Mohammad Rassulov to one year in prison, two years of banning from leaving the country and banning political and social activities for what he calls propaganda against the military. So far a number of festivals, institutions, filmmakers and film journalists around the world have condemned and demanded the lifting of the prison sentence for Mohammad Rasulov.
